video.title: United States of Tara
video.synopsis: Artist and mother Tara Gregson has her hands full juggling her career, her kids and a major case of dissociative identity disorder.

episodes.synopsis: Suburban wife and mother Tara Gregson juggles her family and career while suffering from dissociative identity disorder.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: Once "T" and "Buck" have been in the house, the subsequent cleanup is never easy.
episodes.title: Aftermath

episodes.synopsis: When Tara and Max can't connect in the bedroom, Tara worries that Max may be more interested in her alters than her.
episodes.title: Work

episodes.synopsis: Tara feels the best she's felt in a long time. She loves the mural she is working on and feels she's found a new friend in Tiffany.
episodes.title: Inspiration

episodes.synopsis: Tara turns into "T" and takes off in her car. Max and Charmaine go after her, creating the perfect opportunity for Marshall to throw a party.
episodes.title: Revolution

episodes.synopsis: The family is under the impression that Tara's parents, Bev and Frank, are visiting to celebrate Charmaine's birthday.
episodes.title: Transition

episodes.synopsis: Charmaine has decided to get her breasts redone and has asked Tara to be her caretaker while she recovers.
episodes.title: Alterations

episodes.synopsis: Max has his hands full while "Alice" is out again. Marshall fears Jason's father knows about his crush on Jason.
episodes.title: Abundance

episodes.synopsis: Needing a break from real life, Kate and Tara head out on an impromptu road trip. Max uses this time to search for answers about Tara's past.
episodes.title: Possibility

episodes.synopsis: When Dr. Ocean unexpectedly terminates her treatment, it throws Tara into a total meltdown at the spa with Charmaine.
episodes.title: Betrayal

episodes.synopsis: Tara decides to check into a facility that specializes in dissociation. There, she meets a new doctor who pushes her to recover lost memories.
episodes.title: Snow

episodes.synopsis: With Max and Dr. Holden's help, Tara meets face-to-face with an important person from her past.
episodes.title: Miracle

episodes.synopsis: In the season premiere, a shocking event in the neighborhood changes lives and opens the door on Tara's family secrets.
episodes.title: Yes

episodes.synopsis: Tara realizes her alter egos are showing up again but keeps her condition a secret, and Max decides to renovate the house they've inherited.
episodes.title: Trouble Junction

episodes.synopsis: The truth emerges about Tara's alter egos, one of whom brings out a new side of Max. Meanwhile, Neil learns about Charmaine's engagement.
episodes.title: The Truth Hurts

episodes.synopsis: Tara seeks a new therapist as another alter ego emerges, and Charmaine has big news for the family.
episodes.title: You Becoming You

episodes.synopsis: Max's violent outburst comes back to haunt him. Meanwhile, Tara discovers that she can remain aware of her actions when her new alter ego takes over.
episodes.title: Doin' Time

episodes.synopsis: A tornado forces the Gregsons to seek shelter in their basement, where Tara's new alter ego, Shoshana, takes charge and reveals long-buried secrets.
episodes.title: Tornado!

episodes.synopsis: An impending visit by a social worker has Max in a tailspin, and Tara horns in on Kate's friendship with Lynda.
episodes.title: Dept. of F'd Up Family Services

episodes.synopsis: A happy and healthy Tara prepares for an upcoming art show with Lynda, while Kate retaliates with a controversial new business.
episodes.title: Explosive Diorama

episodes.synopsis: Tara hopes her work on a family portrait will prove healing for the Gregsons. Meanwhile, Max distances himself from Pammy.
episodes.title: The Family Portrait

episodes.synopsis: Max holds an open house to show off his completed remodeling job. Meanwhile, Tara and Charmaine ask their mother about Tara's childhood memories.
episodes.title: Open House

episodes.synopsis: Tara and Charmaine visit the woman from Tara's memories, and Kate tries to change herself for new boyfriend Zach.
episodes.title: To Have and to Hold

episodes.synopsis: In the season finale, Charmaine and Nick prepare to wed, while Tara confronts her parents about her childhood memories.
episodes.title: From This Day Forward

episodes.synopsis: Tara wants to finish the few credits she needs to earn her college degree, but Max worries the stress will trigger a transition to one of her alters.
episodes.title: ...youwillnotwin...

episodes.synopsis: Tara transitions into her psychiatrist alter during her abnormal psychology class; Max considers an offer to sell his business.
episodes.title: Crackerjack

episodes.synopsis: Juggling school and a baby shower causes Tara to transition; to sell the family business, Max must get the approval of his eccentric mother.
episodes.title: The Full F**k You Finger

episodes.synopsis: Tara and Charmaine are rushed to the hospital, where Charmaine declares her baby off limits to her crazy sister; Tara proposes a deal to her alters.
episodes.title: Wheels

episodes.synopsis: Tara receives an intriguing pitch from her instructor; Charmaine and Neil find parenthood a struggle but still refuse Tara's help.
episodes.title: Dr. Hattaras' Miracle Elixir

episodes.synopsis: Tara seems to be making progress, but Dr. Hattaras discovers something disturbing on a tape of her therapy sessions.
episodes.title: The Road to Hell is Paved with Breast Intentions

episodes.synopsis: Max is delighted by Tara's suggestion that he reunite his rock band; Tara is turned away from further sessions by a depressed Dr. Hattaras.
episodes.title: The Electrifying & Magnanimouse Return of Beaverlamp

episodes.synopsis: A scare at a local corn maze leaves Tara shaken, and she later reveals a new alter; Kate escorts Max and Marshall to New York.
episodes.title: Chicken 'n' Corn

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Hattaras and Tara seek the help of another professional to deal with her violent new alter, Bryce.
episodes.title: Bryce Will Play

episodes.synopsis: Max and Marshall return home to disturbing news about Dr. Hattaras and Lionel; Tara hides the existence of her new alter.
episodes.title: Train Wreck

episodes.synopsis: Tara's other alters disappear, leaving only Bryce; Marshall moves in with his grandmother; Kate spends more time in St. Louis with Evan.
episodes.title: Crunchy Ice

episodes.synopsis: Tara and Max go to Boston for help from an expert; Neil and Charmaine prepare to move to Houston; Kate receives a life-changing proposal.
episodes.title: The Good Parts
